Name: petroleum and gas production, offshore | petroleum | EN15804GD, U
Category: B:Mining and quarrying/06:Extraction of crude petroleum and natural gas
Description: This dataset represents the offshore extraction of petroleum and gas via conventional extraction methods. This includes the gas lift process and deep-pump pumping (see Meili et al., 2023, chapter 3.1), as well as a default share of 15% enhanced oil recovery (EOR; described in section 4.2 of Meili et al., 2023). For the natural gas production, also the processing of the gas (e.g., drying and desulfurization) is considered.
